title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and 
(Section 30(b)) 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 2nd day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 
the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and Superannuation 
30(b) of 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 August, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [422] 3
